# IRLibrary

The goal of IRLibrary is to provide functions needed for Oregon's Integrated Report Assessment

## Installation

You can install the released version of IRLibrary from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("TravisPritchardODEQ/IRLibrary")
```
